alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:29PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 900 PM MST... At 829 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Claypool, or 8 miles north of Globe, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Central Heights-Midland City, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 244 and 266. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 257. AZ Route 77 near mile marker 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County
